name: Stranded Girls
description:
(This game was created for the 2018 Yuri Jam and is currently in early access at pre-alpha stage.)

Stranded on an uncharted island after a storm, an aviator named Ethel and a schoolgirl named Yuna must cooperate to survive despite being unable to understand each other. While trying to stay alive and find a way out the island, they slowly overcome the language barrier and fall in love with each other...

Stranded Girls is a game about love and survival : Explore the island, gather supplies and resources, craft weapon, tools and equipments, and find a way to escape the island while staying alive!

_____________________

The game is currently in a pre-alpha stage, and many features will be added in the future, so stay tuned!

_____________________
